mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.forum_name as forumName ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jiaoshi_id as jiaoshiId ,a.users_id as usersId ,a.forum_content as forumContent ,a.super_ids as superIds ,a.forum_state_types as forumStateTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete as jiaoshiDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete ,users.username as uusername ,users.password as upassword ,users.role as urole ,users.addtime as uaddtime
FROM forum a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id left JOIN users users ON a.users_id = users.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.forum_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumName},'%')
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and ( a.users_id = #{params.usersId} )
and a.forum_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumContent},'%')
and a.super_ids >= #{params.superIdsStart}
and a.super_ids <= #{params.superIdsEnd}
and a.super_ids = #{params.superIds}
and a.forum_state_types = #{params.forumStateTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete >= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteStart}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete <= #{params.jiaoshiDeleteEnd}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_delete = #{params.jiaoshiDelete}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
and a.users_id IS NOT NULL
and users.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and users.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and users.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
